page.title: Check Point UTM-1 Edge NW ADSL

}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Cavium]]'' CN5010 [[MIPS64]] (@500MHz) *Memory: 128MB (SDRAM) DDR2 *Storage: 2MB Boot Sector Flash, 128MB NAND Flash *WiFi: [[Atheros]] AR9287 (802.11bgn) *Network: 5x Gigabit Ethernet, 1x ADSL *USB: 1x USB 2.0 ports *PCI: 1x ExpressCard/54
==Links of Interest== [https://www.cpug.org/forums/showthread.php/6341-UTM-1-Edges-FAQ User Group FAQ]
